homepage.title: Discover the world's symbolic heritage
homepage.subtitle: Explore, contribute and learn about cultural patterns across ages
homepage.featuresTitle: A collaborative museum dedicated to symbols

contributions.title: Contributions

contributions.contributionSubmitted: Your contribution has been successfully submitted and will be reviewed by our team.

symbolTriptych.noDescription: No description available for this symbol.
symbolTriptych.imageErrorDesc: The image couldn't be loaded properly. An alternative image is being displayed.

symbolExplorer.title: Symbol Explorer
symbolExplorer.description: Explore our collection of cultural symbols, patterns and motifs
symbolExplorer.noResults: No symbols match your filter criteria
symbolExplorer.mapViewDescription: Explore symbols based on their geographical origin and distribution

callToAction.joinUs: Join our global community of heritage enthusiasts
callToAction.description: Help us preserve and celebrate cultural symbols from around the world through collaborative documentation and sharing.
callToAction.support: Your contributions help preserve global symbolic heritage for future generations.

hero.community: Join a community of cultural enthusiasts

about.title: About Symbolica Museum
about.subtitle: Preserving and exploring our global symbolic heritage

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Symbolica Museum, we're dedicated to preserving and showcasing the rich tapestry of symbolic expressions across all human cultures.
mission.description2: Through collaborative efforts, we aim to document, analyze, and celebrate the visual language that connects us across time and geography.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where cultural motifs are preserved, understood, and continually inspire new creations.
vision.value1: Preservation of cultural heritage through digital documentation

analysisProcess.title: Our Analysis Process
analysisProcess.subtitle: How we transform cultural artifacts into catalogued symbolic patterns

member1.name: Sarah Johnson
member1.bio: With over 15 years in cultural anthropology, Sarah founded Symbolica to preserve endangered symbolic traditions.

member2.name: David Chen
member2.bio: David leads our technical efforts, developing AI systems that help identify and classify symbolic patterns.

member3.name: Maria Rodriguez
member3.bio: Maria builds partnerships with cultural institutions and coordinates our global community of contributors.

uploadTools.title: Upload & Analysis Tools
uploadTools.subtitle: Contribute to our growing database of symbols

process.example: Our system identifies recurring patterns, extracts them, and matches them against our database.

mapping.title: Global Mapping
mapping.description: Visualize symbolic connections across cultures and time periods through our interactive map interface.

identification.title: Symbol Identification
identification.description: Upload images to identify symbols and discover their cultural context, history and significance.

documentation.title: Collaborative Documentation
documentation.description: Contribute to our database by adding symbols, historical context and cultural significance.

howItWorks.intro: From discovery to digitization, we make symbolic heritage accessible

1.title: Capture
1.desc: Upload images of patterns from artifacts, architecture, or textiles

2.title: Identify
2.desc: Our AI helps identify the pattern and find similar examples

3.title: Explore
3.desc: Discover the cultural context and historical significance

4.title: Share
4.desc: Contribute to the global repository of symbolic knowledge

community.title: Join a Global Community of Symbol Enthusiasts
community.description: Connect with people passionate about cultural symbols and heritage from around the world.

thematicCommunities.title: Thematic Communities
thematicCommunities.description: Join specialized communities focused on particular symbol traditions, regions, or time periods.

personalSpace.title: Personal Collections
personalSpace.description: Build and organize your own library of symbolic patterns that resonate with you.

intuitiveNavigation.title: Advanced Discovery
intuitiveNavigation.description: Explore connections between symbols across cultures and time periods with our intuitive navigation.
